ModMetaData.name: Bionics Expanded
ModMetaData.author: Pratix
ModMetaData.description:
Adds some prosthetics and bionics which should be in the base game but aren't.
Includes:
- Prosthetic lung - Prosthetic kidney - Prosthetic liver - Prosthetic eye - Prosthetic stomach - Prosthetic spine
- Bionic liver
